apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that the requested operation is not supported.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that the requested operation is not supported.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new UnsupportedOperationError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new UnsupportedOperationError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that null was received when an object was required.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that null was received when an object was required.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new NullPointerError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new NullPointerError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that an object could not or should not be cloned.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that an object could not or should not be cloned.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new CloneNotSupportedError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new CloneNotSupportedError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that you pass an invalid enumeration value to a method or when setting a property.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that you pass an invalid enumeration value to a method or when setting a property.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new InvalidEnumArgumentError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new InvalidEnumArgumentError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that another type of class was expected.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that another type of class was expected.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new ClassCastError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new ClassCastError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown when an operation is performed on a disposed object that implements the org.as3coreaddendum.system.IDisposable interface.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown when an operation is performed on a disposed object that implements the org.as3coreaddendum.system.IDisposable interface.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new ObjectDisposedError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new ObjectDisposedError instance.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that an object entered into an illegal state.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The error that is thrown to indicate that an object entered into an illegal state.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor, creates a new IllegalStateError instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: A string associated with the error object.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor, creates a new IllegalStateError instance.
